title: Ignota's SCP-6231 Pixel Fanart
content:

[[=]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/5hFb3H5.gif]]
++ [https://www.tiktok.com/@ironshearss/video/7049276919342238981?lang=en&is_copy_url=1&is_from_webapp=v1 Process Video] | [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-6231 SCP-6231]
[[<]]
> **Filename:** 6231.mp4, 6231.png
> **Author:** IronShears
> **License:** https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/
> **Source Link:** https://www.tiktok.com/@ironshearss?lang=en&is_copy_url=1&is_from_webapp=v1
> **Derivative of:** SCP-6231 by AvocadoMilk
[[/<]]
-----
I knew I had to draw a play structure for this because it was definitely the first thing I thought of! Also ended up trying a quaternary color scheme. Never really done that before! I think it turned out nice!

I've been trying to experiment more with the colors lately because more often than not I just end up going with complementary palettes. I think there's a lot of room for exploration but always end up going back to that. 

But yeah! I think this one turned out soft.

+ [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/art:art-mycotherapy More Art Mycotherapy]
[[/=]]
[[/div]]
author: IronShears
